Description: The dataset contains the information about cycleways in Christchurch. A dedicated route or path designed specifically for bicycles, providing a safe and convenient means of transportation for people who cycle and encouraging cycling as a sustainable and healthy mode of transportation. It is spatially abstracted to a Line.

Attributes.description: The status of cycleway, can be in three statuses: In Service, Not In Service, In Capital Programme
The name of cycleway in Christchurch
The type of cycleway, can be different types, like  Shared path, Cycle line, etc.
The direction of cycleway, can be different types, like Both or One way.
The date of cycleway creation in Christchurch
The last date of edited information about cycleway in Christchurch
The length of cycleway in meters
The set of coordinates of the cycleway line on the map in Christchurch
